definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: The little girl was fascinated by all the fish swimming in the aquarium tanks.
sentences.chinese: 小女孩被水族箱中所有魚的泳姿所吸引入神。

sentences.english: Goldfish are very attractive when they swim in aquariums or fish bowls .
sentences.chinese: 金魚在水族箱或魚缸裏遊動時十分漂亮。

sentences.english: There are about a thousand fish of different species in the aquarium, which is approximately 50 metres long.
sentences.chinese: 長達50米的水族箱裏養着上千種不同種類的魚。

sentences.english: Try to clear all bubble fishes from the aquarium by blowing them up with air shots.
sentences.chinese: 嘗試清除水族箱與空氣槍吹它們都泡魚。

sentences.english: Add 30mL to every new aquarium-water 's 3 times.
sentences.chinese: 新建水族箱前三次添量爲30mL。

sentences.english: To help new fish to fit the environment of aquarium.
sentences.chinese: 對新進魚只適應水族箱環境有很好的幫助。

definition: Yuchi or Yuchih township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
